claim_evidence: Our results suggest the advantage of learning unary rules : unary rule-bases performbetter than binary rulesit is better to directly learn unary rules than to derive them from binary rule-bases
evidence: Our results suggest the advantage of learning unary rules : unary rule-bases performbetter than binary rules ; it is better to directly learn unary rules than to derive them from binary rule-bases .
text: Our results suggest the advantage of learning unary rules : unary rule-bases performbetter than binary rules ; it is better to directly learn unary rules than to derive them from binary rule-bases .
